title: How to Check eBay Sold Prices

steps.title: Open the eBay app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the eBay app on your phone or tablet. The icon has "ebay" in colorful letters on a white background.

steps.title: Search for an item.
steps.content: Search for an item. Using the search bar at the top, type in the item that you are looking for and tap the search icon on your keyboard. Or, you can view recent or saved searches. On an iPhone, view your recent or saved searches by tapping the search icon in the bottom center.

steps.title: Tap Filter.
steps.content: Tap Filter . This is in the top right below the shopping cart icon.

steps.title: Toggle on the switch next to "Sold items".
steps.content: Toggle on the switch next to "Sold items". This will be at the bottom of the filter panel. If you don't see it, you may need to tap Show more .

steps.title: Turn on any other filters.
steps.content: Turn on any other filters. This will help refine your search. Common filters to use might be price and condition, or can be more specific to your item, like color or device model.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . This in in blue text in the top right corner.

steps.title: Scroll through to see the items.
steps.content: Scroll through to see the items. The price listed is the final sold price.

steps.title: Go to https://www.ebay.com/ on a browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.ebay.com/ on a browser. This can be any browser, such as Chrome, Firefox, or Safari.

steps.title: Search for an item.
steps.content: Search for an item. Using the search bar at the top, type in the item that you are looking for and click the search icon. Use the drop-down to the right of the search bar to select a category, such as "clothing" or "music".

steps.title: Click on the checkbox next to "Sold items" in the left panel.
steps.content: Click on the checkbox next to "Sold items" in the left panel. This is under the "Show only" section. If you don't see this option, click More filtersâ€¦ at the bottom. The page will refresh automatically to show the filtered results.

steps.title: Turn on any other filters.
steps.content: Turn on any other filters. This will help refine your search. Common filters to use might be price and condition, or can be more specific to your item, like color or device model.

steps.title: Scroll through to see the items.
steps.content: Scroll through to see the items. The price listed is the final sold price.
